We stopped into Bardot one morning for an alfresco breakfast.  The waitress was very friendly.  It's located in a prime location on Granados, smack-dab in the upscale Eixample District.  Our simple and straightforward breakfast (eggs, bacon, bread) was all tasty and well-presented.  The only thing that hinders me from giving Bardot 4-stars is simply that the wait-time to get our breakfast was exorbitantly lengthy -- I mean, we were starving by the time the food arrived...!  Again, though, really friendly waitress....
